about.title: About Us
about.description:
Book now and immerse yourself in a different way of visiting Florence – by feeling right at home. Our fully furnished rooms and apartments offer an affordable stay in the historic San Niccolò neighborhood, just a short walk from Ponte Vecchio.
Lorenzo & Lorenzo host with the warmth of longtime friends, creating a simple, youthful atmosphere where guests are welcomed like family, surrounded by cafés, osterie, pizzerie, bakeries, art galleries and local shops that capture the real Florentine spirit.
about.snippet: Meet “Il Bello” and “Il Vagge” — two longtime friends who turned their San Niccolò apartment into a welcoming bed & breakfast for modern travelers.

neighborhood.title: Discover Our Neighborhood
neighborhood.description: Stay in San Niccolò, a historic neighborhood within Florence’s ancient walls, steps from the Arno and Ponte Vecchio, full of cafés, osterie, art galleries and small local shops. Our reception and main base of operations are right here, even though we host rooms and apartments across Florence, so every walking distance mentioned below refers to this San Niccolò home base.

hosts.title: Your Hosts
hosts.subtitle: Two friends who turned their love for Florence into a home for travelers.
hosts.bio: Locals know them as “Il Bello” and “Il Vagge”: Lorenzo Bellini, with a sun‑worn Tuscan face and big hands that fix everything from elevators to tricky situations, and Lorenzo Vaggelli, the blonde with shy eyes and a wild beard who happily crosses Florence on foot to visit friends. Together they run their San Niccolò bed & breakfast in the same Oltrarno streets where it all began – a little village inside the city, between the Arno and the climb to San Miniato, dotted with cafés, bakeries, galleries and trattorie – welcoming guests with the warmth and humour of true Florentines.

parking.title: Lorenzo & Lorenzo’s Parking
parking.subtitle: Exclusive guest parking just outside the ZTL.
parking.intro: To make your stay easier, we offer exclusive, convenient parking options for our guests. Our parking is just outside Florence’s limited traffic zone (ZTL), so you can arrive by car and explore the city on foot.
parking.contact: Planning your visit? Reach out at lorenzoelorenzo@libero.it for parking availability and reservations.

items.location: Strategic location just outside the ZTL, close to the historic center.
items.pricing: Competitive pricing whether you stay a few nights or several days.
items.booking: We recommend booking in advance, especially during peak seasons, to guarantee your spot.

faq.title: Good to know
faq.subtitle: A few quick answers to the questions guests ask most often.

lateCheckin.a: Yes. Late arrivals are no problem—just let us know your expected arrival time and we’ll coordinate the check-in with you directly.

luggage.a: We can usually store your luggage before check-in or after check-out. Let us know in advance so we can arrange it.

parking.a: Yes. We offer private parking just outside the ZTL with daily and weekly rates. See the Parking section for details.

touristTax.q: Is there a tourist tax in Florence?
touristTax.a: Guests pay a tourist tax starting from €6.00 per person per night, up to 7 nights, as part of their reservation. It is set by the Municipality of Florence. Call us for specific details.
